recipes.name: Paneer Butter Masala
ingredients: Spices (turmeric, garam masala, chili powder, salt)
instructions: Chop onions, tomatoes, and prepare spices.
Heat butter in a pan and sauté onions until golden brown.
Add tomato puree and cook until oil separates.
Blend mixture into a smooth gravy and return to pan.
Add cream, spices, and paneer cubes. Simmer for 10 minutes.
Garnish with coriander and serve hot with naan or rice.

recipes.name: Vegetable Pulao
ingredients: Whole spices (bay leaf, cloves, cardamom, cinnamon)
instructions: Wash and soak rice for 20 minutes.
Heat ghee/oil in a cooker, add whole spices and sauté.
Add onion, sauté till golden, then add vegetables.
Mix rice and sauté for 2 minutes.
Add 2 cups water, salt, and pressure cook for 2 whistles.
Fluff with fork and serve hot with raita.

recipes.name: Chicken Biryani
ingredients: Whole spices (cloves, cardamom, cinnamon, bay leaf)
instructions: Marinate chicken with yogurt, ginger-garlic paste, and spices for at least 30 mins.
Cook rice with whole spices until 70% done.
In a deep pan, layer chicken at bottom, then half-cooked rice.
Add fried onions, mint, coriander, and saffron milk.
Cover tightly and cook on low flame (dum) for 20–25 mins.
Mix gently and serve hot with raita.

recipes.name: Fish Curry
ingredients: Spices (turmeric, chili powder, coriander powder, salt)
instructions: Marinate fish pieces with turmeric and salt, set aside.
Heat oil in a pan, sauté onions until golden.
Add tomatoes and cook until soft.
Add spices and tamarind paste, stir well.
Pour in coconut milk and simmer gently.
Add marinated fish pieces, cook for 10–12 minutes until done.
Serve hot with steamed rice.

recipes.name: Aloo Gobi
ingredients: Spices (turmeric, chili powder, garam masala, salt)
instructions: Heat oil and sauté onions.
Add tomatoes and spices, cook until soft.
Add potatoes and cauliflower, stir well.
Cover and cook until vegetables are tender.
Serve hot with chapati.

recipes.name: Chole (Chickpea Curry)
ingredients: Spices (chole masala, chili powder, turmeric, salt)
instructions: Boil soaked chickpeas until soft.
Sauté onions, then add tomato puree and spices.
Add chickpeas and simmer for 15 minutes.
Garnish with coriander and serve with bhature.

recipes.name: Masoor Dal
instructions: Boil dal with turmeric until soft.
Prepare tempering with onions, tomatoes, and spices.
Mix into dal and simmer for 5 minutes.
Serve with rice or roti.

recipes.name: Palak Paneer
ingredients: Spices (turmeric, chili powder, garam masala, salt)
instructions: Blanch spinach, blend into puree.
Sauté onions and tomatoes with spices.
Add spinach puree and paneer cubes.
Simmer for 10 minutes and serve.

recipes.name: Veg Hakka Noodles
instructions: Boil noodles and drain.
Stir-fry vegetables in oil.
Add sauces and noodles, toss well.
Serve hot.

recipes.name: Veg Manchurian
instructions: Mix grated vegetables with cornflour, shape balls, and fry.
Prepare sauce with onions, capsicum, and soy sauce.
Add fried balls into sauce, cook for 5 mins.
Serve hot with fried rice.

recipes.name: Mutton Rogan Josh
ingredients: Spices (kashmiri chili, turmeric, garam masala, fennel)
instructions: Marinate mutton with spices.
Cook onions and tomatoes, add mutton.
Simmer with water for 45 mins until tender.
Serve hot with naan.

recipes.name: Egg Curry
ingredients: Spices (turmeric, chili powder, garam masala, salt)
instructions: Fry boiled eggs lightly.
Prepare onion-tomato gravy with spices.
Add eggs and simmer for 10 mins.
Serve with rice or roti.

recipes.name: Prawn Masala
instructions: Marinate prawns with turmeric and salt.
Sauté onions and tomatoes with spices.
Add prawns and cook for 10 mins.
Serve with rice.

recipes.name: Keema Curry
ingredients: Spices (garam masala, chili powder, turmeric, salt)
instructions: Cook onions and tomatoes with spices.
Add minced meat and peas.
Simmer for 20 mins.
Serve with paratha.

recipes.name: Butter Chicken
ingredients: Spices (garam masala, chili powder, turmeric, salt)
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices.
Grill chicken until half cooked.
Prepare tomato-onion gravy, add butter & cream.
Mix chicken pieces and simmer for 20 mins.

recipes.name: Tandoori Chicken
ingredients: Spices (red chili, garam masala, turmeric, salt)
instructions: Marinate chicken with yogurt, lemon, and spices.
Cook in oven/tandoor until charred.
Serve with mint chutney.
